modName: Secret Servant aka Dremora Butler - Increased Carry Capacity
descriptionHtml:
He did say he always dreamed of being a pack mule.

This mod simply increases the carry capacity of the Secret Servant/Dremora Butler from the Dragonborn expansion to over 3,000. 

It seemed weird to me that he was being summoned from Oblivion to carry less junk than I can.

Now he has a reason to be such a complainer. 

Dragonborn DLC required.
author: Konrann
